headline: Southern France under heatwave warning with temperatures set to rise Monday
description: On Monday, 46 central and southern departments in France will be placed under an orange heatwave alert, accounting for more than half of mainland France.

headline: Fight against polio under threat by withdrawal of US funding
description: Global vaccination campaigns have reduced cases of this disease by 99%, but budget setbacks and difficulties reaching the last endemic areas are now jeopardizing the goal of total eradication.

headline: Iceland's Eyjafjallajökull volcano is being overrun by Instagrammers
description: 'Of Volcanoes and Men' (4/6). Made famous by its spectacular 2010 eruption, Eyjafjallajökull in Iceland has since attracted waves of tourists armed with their smartphones. Finnish photographer Juuso Westerlund followed in the footsteps of these crowds, who have transformed a rugged, wild landscape into an Instagram backdrop.
